answer: Yes. The Runner is able to trash Mumbad Virtual Tour, so they must do so. If the Runner has only 2 but a full [Ghost Runner](/en/card/06040) installed, is the Runner forced to spend the credits from Ghost Runner to trash Mumbad Virtual Tour?
